alert.note: Alert for Otero (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 23 at 8:53AM MDT until June 25 at 2:24PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. Arkansas River At La Junta affecting Otero County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Fowler affecting Otero and Crowley Counties. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Nepesta, and La Junta, ...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River At La Junta. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Moderate Flood. Local residential flooding is possible in La Junta. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM MDT Friday the stage was 10.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 13.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.4 feet on 06/12/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this morning at 1000 AM MDT.
